mdait.description: Markdown AI Translator - AI-powered translation tool for Markdown files
mdait.sync.title: mdait: Sync
mdait.trans.title: mdait: Translate
mdait.status.sync.title: Sync
mdait.translate.directory.title: Translate Directory
mdait.translate.file.title: Translate File
mdait.translate.unit.title: Translate Unit
mdait.jumpToSource.title: Jump to Source
mdait.viewsContainer.title: mdait
mdait.status.view.title: Translation Status
mdait.configuration.title: mdait
mdait.transPairs.description: List of source and target directory pairs for translation. Paths are relative to workspace root.
mdait.transPairs.title: Translation Pair
mdait.transPairs.sourceDir.description: Path to the directory containing source language documents.
mdait.transPairs.targetDir.description: Path to the directory to store target language documents.
mdait.ignoredPatterns.description: List of glob patterns for files and directories to exclude from translation and sync processing.
mdait.sync.autoDelete.description: Automatically delete units on target side when deleted on source side during sync.
mdait.trans.markdown.skipCodeBlocks.desc: Whether to exclude code blocks from translation targets when translating markdown
mdait.trans.ollama.model.description: Ollama model name to use for translation
